code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Nav from'react-bootstrap/Nav';import'./roomCard.css';function RoomCard(props){const navigate=useNavigate();const[images,setImages]=useState([]);const[href,setHref]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{setImages(props.images.split(','));setHref("/stardust/rooms/".concat(props.id));},[]);const handleClick=()=>{navigate(href);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"room-card"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"room-image",style:{backgroundImage:"url("+images[0]+")"},alt:props.alt},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"roomLinkContainer"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Nav.Link,{className:"roomLink",onClick:handleClick},"Click Here to View This Room"))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"room-title"},props.title),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,props.description));}export default RoomCard;
